translations: adv.（像）咏叙调地，以咏叙的方式
n.（Arioso）（美、巴、印尼）艾力奥索（人名）

phrs.translation: 咏叙调, 咏叹调, 诉说

sentences.sentence: I don't think it is very arioso!
According to the description in a Dream of Red Mansions, the delicious food, the exquisite tableware, the arioso music and the elegant environment constitute the pictorial culture of "Red Mansions".
sentences.translation: 根据《红楼梦》里的描述，美味的菜肴、精致的餐具、悦耳的音乐、幽雅的环境，这四美构成了丰富多彩的红楼宴文化。
